name: AASHARA BAHUUDDESHIYA TRUST
briefDescription: Aashara Bahuuddeshiya Trust means social equality & development.This charitable institute registered in 21/09/2011. Pavitra Mohan Shirkar is a President of this Trust.She has inclination to work for under privileged class against all forms of discrimination and sensitizing the people about constitutional provisions Work for the people those who are deprived of their Basic Needs, Fundamental Rights. Education, Health and Economical right. To implement this ideology Aashara Bahuuddeshiya Trust runs various programmes in Society.
